details.sectionContent: A guest lecture will be conducted by the experts of the HR from Multi-National Companies

The seminar about the Leadership Development will be conducted by the HR of MultiNational Companies. The participants can extract maximum knowledge from the company HR leads. They can build better communication and management skills.

Date: 21/02/2018 
AERO AUDITORIUM(2ND FLOOR) 
01:00 AM to 03:00 PM
